title: Deliciously Doable Small Plates from Around the World
description: Internationally-renowned Chef Marisol Murano brings you a delicious world of small plates and dazzling sights from her work as a destination chef.  But Deliciously Doable Small Plates from Around the World is more than a it's a lifestyle. These 60+ deliciously doable recipes are infused with Chef Marisol's love of food and sense of adventure. You will find traditional recipes as well as new favorites you will want to make again and again – whether it’s tapas from Spain, mezze from the Mediterranean basin, pinchos from South America, kobachi from Japan, or sliders from the U.S.A.This ebook has been designed exclusively for the tablet and smart phone, so that its gorgeous food and travel photos fill the screen. Recipes are easy to follow without page zooming or flipping. Plus, the recipes are enhanced with the Chef’s stories about the food, ingredients and destinations. As a bonus, you can also watch videos, listen to world music and get additional recipes at www.MarisolChef.com and on Facebook at Marisol Murano.Easy to make recipes that are good for you and good enough to share with family and this is your recipe for the small plates lifestyle.
author: Marisol Murano
